about_the_game:
Locked in my Darkness 2: The Room, is a first-person psychological horror game that focuses on exploring and creating fear in the player.

Story


This is the story of Yuki Tachibana, a Japanese high school student who moved with her parents to a humble apartment outside Japan, however the dark past of her parents would end up chasing them to New York, USA.

Features


Immersive experience: An atmospheric-realistic graphics.
Gameplay: This game is primarly a first person psychological horror walking simulator.
Psychological horror: The game contains some disturbing audio for the horror experience.
Collectibles: This game has collectibles.

name: Locked in my Darkness 2: The Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 TI
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K / AMD Ryzen 3-5000 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device.

short_description: Locked in my Darkness 2: The Room is a psychological horror game set from the perspective of a Japanese high school student in a New York apartment complex.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
